name: Euro Global Summit On Infectious Diseases and Microbiology
content: EGSIDM2024, the Euro Global Summit on Infectious Diseases and Microbiology, is a premier international conference happening in Dubai, UAE from November 14-18, 2024\. This event focuses on the Future Prospects of Microbiology to Prevent Infectious Diseases, bringing together top academics and emerging researchers for collaboration on multidisciplinary challenges. It's a global platform for sharing vital information and fostering stimulating discussions in these fields.
